amendment.description: To amend provisions relating to the upward bound program under section 402C of the Higher Education Act of 1965.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2368 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2368 proposed by Senator Kennedy for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S9731-9733; text: CR S9731) To amend provisions relating to the upward bound program under section 402C of the Higher Education Act of 1965.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2368 proposed by Senator Kennedy for Senator Boxer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2368 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
